#Treatment design




#setup
```{r loading package}
library(readr)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```



```{r}
data<- read_csv("../data/Midterm_proj_data.csv")
data
```
#wrangling
```{r}

data_w<- data %>%
  #remove NA
  na.omit() %>%
  
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  separate(sample_id,
           into = c("p", "id")) %>%
  mutate( fertilizer_legacy = case_when(
    
   id <= 96 ~ "BL",
   id >96 ~ "MF"
          )) %>%

  
  dplyr::select(eas_x,nor_y,x0_5_loi_g_kg, x5_10_loi_g_kg, x10_20_loi_g_kg, x20_40_loi_g_kg, x40_60_loi_g_kg, x60_90_loi_g_kg, soil_drainage_type, fertilizer_legacy)
  
  
  #mutate(0-5_loi = x0_5_loi_g_kg) %>%
  #mutate(10-20_loi= x10_20_loi_g_kg) %>%
  #mutate(20-40_loi= x20_40_loi_g_kg) %>%
  #mutate(40-60_loi= x40_60_loi_g_kg) %>%
  #mutate(60-90_loi = x60_90_loi_g_kg


#mutate(level1= str_remove(x0_5_loi_g_kg,"x"))  # to remove x
  
data_w
  
```
```{r summary}
summary(data_w)
```



```{r}
library(lme4)
# Changing to sum-to-zero contrast
options(contrasts = c("contr.sum", "contr.poly"))

mod1<- lmer(data = data_w,
            formula = x0_5_loi_g_kg~
              (fertilizer_legacy* soil_drainage_type) +
             (1|fertilizer_legacy)
            )
```
